page.title: 03LISTER HOSPITAL STEVENAGE
page.content: Opened in 1975 the 637 bed Lister serves Stevenage Hitchin,Letchworth and Baldock. In addition to the general acute medical{specialities}the hospital has a{psychiatric}wing and a new{maternity}unit. Careful use of the sloping site has meant that patient traffic and accommodation are segregated from goods and services traffic. Levels 5 to 11 are occupied by the main ward units. Each floor has sixty been arranged in four 15 bed units each having three 4 bed wards and three single wards grouped around a nurses station for easy observation. All other facilities are located in levels 1 to 4. The new{maternity}wing has been designed to give comfortable surroundings with Habitat-style decor, coupled with excellent medical care. Lister employs many local people.There are modern homes for medical staff.
